item.title: Helping Someone Learn to Program
item.description: A family member came to me and said that he is interested in learning how to program. Reflection on my experience learning software in academia I started to think about how I would want to learn programming if I didn’t do so in school. There are a few key goals I would want to focus on if I was starting out: Have a concrete project in mind. Learn how to get started quickly.
